subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Neymar struck with a stunning early volley for the second game in a row and brilliantly set up the second goal to give host Brazil a win over Mexico in the Confederations Cup on Wednesday.
snippet: Neymar struck with a stunning early volley for the second game in a row and brilliantly set up the second goal to give host Brazil a win over Mexico in the Confederations Cup on Wednesday.
